text: (tavada) movun boruvama adhika vasayen asannaha. anumata nomæti dæyama adhika vasayen gila damamin sitinnaha. mevænnan (yamkisi sadharanayak sadaha) oba veta pæminiyahot (oba kæmati nam) ovun atare viniscaya denu. nætahot (viniscaya nokara) ovunva pratiksepa kara damanu. oba ovunva pratiksepa kara dæmuvada, ovun obata kisima haniyak kirimata nohæka. oba viniscaya kalahot, ovun atare sadharana tinduvakma laba denu. mandayat niyata vasayenma allah viniscayakaruvanva priya karanneya
